task.summary: Default task
fixed several problems with Options.restart_required() * replaced profile key is_light_theme with theme * fixed bug where Button.click_display_time was too long
added suggestions for improving Assemblitor
reported bug
reported bug

major improvements to the whole execution process * after reaching last step, clicking step_BTN once will do nothing * fixed parity issues regarding Editor.run_all() and Editor.run_step(): threw different errors when STP was missing * a runtime error will now stop freezing out_SCT content (= program steps can be executed even after an error got thrown, due to program reset) * code cleanup * empty programs won't change accu and pc to 0 * single step mode will now highlight the cell that just got executed, accu changes accordingly

major improvements to the whole execution process * after reaching last step, clicking step_BTN once will do nothing * fixed parity issues regarding Editor.run_all() and Editor.run_step(): threw different errors when STP was missing * a runtime error will now stop freezing out_SCT content (= program steps can be executed even after an error got thrown, due to program reset) * code cleanup * empty programs won't change accu and pc to 0 * single step mode will now highlight the cell that just got executed, accu changes accordingly
Editor.prgc_value_LBL/accu_value_LBL/ireg_cmd/opr_LBL will now keep their value when executing (won't be cleared by an error) * fixed bug when executing STP where PC could get negative
Editor.prgc_value_LBL/accu_value_LBL/ireg_cmd/opr_LBL will now keep their value when executing (won't be cleared by an error) * fixed bug when executing STP where PC could get negative
Editor.prgc_value_LBL/accu_value_LBL/ireg_cmd/opr_LBL will now keep their value when executing (won't be cleared by an error) * fixed bug when executing STP where PC could get negative
fixed bug when cancelling saving process for unsaved changes when opening new program * code cleanup * introduced Editor.action_on_closing_unsaved_prg for future option
new option closing_unsaved

major cleanup of Emulator * refactoring * reworked several error messages * output consistency regarding leading zeros in ireg and error messages * every cell will now at least have an empty operand * reverted "single step mode will now highlight the cell that just got executed, accu changes accordingly" due to bad highlighting with JMPs

finished Editor.change_selected_inp_text() * now supports whitespace wrapping * refuses to change for non-addresses/non-operands * fixed edge case bugs
* fixed bug when having more than one whitespace before an address
fixed bug for Editor.change_selected_inp_text() * threw error when changing line with spaces (e.g. " ")
test push
test push

isolated CodeBlock-related functions from Editor to Widgets * OutCodeBlock now jumps to current PC if it would be out of sight * InpCodeBlock now jumps to cursor pos if it would be out of sight after a newline

isolated CodeBlock-related functions from Editor to Widgets * OutCodeBlock now jumps to current PC if it would be out of sight * InpCodeBlock now jumps to cursor pos if it would be out of sight after a newline
updated outdated example program in Editor.assembly_SUB

disable wrap for Codeblocks and instead introduced a dynamic horizontal scrollbar * renamed Editor.inp_SCT to Editor.inp_CDB and Editor.out_SCT to Editor.out_CDB * Codeblocks are now based on Frames, not ScrolledTexts

disable wrap for Codeblocks and instead introduced a dynamic horizontal scrollbar * renamed Editor.inp_SCT to Editor.inp_CDB and Editor.out_SCT to Editor.out_CDB * Codeblocks are now based on Frames, not ScrolledTexts

disable wrap for Codeblocks and instead introduced a dynamic horizontal scrollbar * renamed Editor.inp_SCT to Editor.inp_CDB and Editor.out_SCT to Editor.out_CDB * Codeblocks are now based on Frames, not ScrolledTexts
new Editor.file_MNU command "New" * added shortcut "ctrl + n" for command "New" * added missing translation for certain shortcut combos
new widget Slider * unifinished bugfixing because Spinbox event <<Modified>> won't get called

finished bugfixing regarding Spinbox.validate_chars() * Spinbox is now unable to be blank -> will default to 0 * Spinbox will now cut off unnecessary zeros at the front * improved method redirecion in Spinbox.__init__()

finished Spinbox and Slider * implemented Spinbox for Editor.chng_SBX * added a slider_wheel sprite * reworked structure of SpriteHandler and program/sprites * bugfixing for CodeBlock (bug for using <Control-Shift-Z when all is redone, for reselecting changed text) * buttons can now get locked * incr-/decr_BTN now get locked when nothing is selected

finished Spinbox and Slider * implemented Spinbox for Editor.chng_SBX * added a slider_wheel sprite * reworked structure of SpriteHandler and program/sprites * bugfixing for CodeBlock (bug for using <Control-Shift-Z when all is redone, for reselecting changed text) * buttons can now get locked * incr-/decr_BTN now get locked when nothing is selected

implemented Spinbox for options_SUB * Spinbox now supports textvariables * OptionMenu doesn't require a command parameter * SpriteHandler doesn't require a theme parameter * small cleanup in Subwindows.Options * Slider speed is now controlled by the threshold parameter
Spinbox text will now be selected when clicking on the widget
Slider can now de-/increment by shortly clicking it * fixed bug occurring when redoing text with capslock on

reference the licence in all .py files
* fixed mistake lang.asm_win.text: referenced wrong memory cell
* deactivated dev_mode
* readded icon sprite
minor punctuation in README.md
